1th.Heading: What is Fotron?
1th.Text: Fotron - a marketplace for the sale of ERC20 tokens of various projects that could be used for distribution the following general principles embedded in an open and audited smart contract:

List.1th: Escrow - storage of TRX, received from the sale of tokens, and the possibility of resale of tokens until the end of the lockup-period.
List.2th: Referral system - for attracting a buyer of tokens, remuneration is paid to TRX.
List.3th: Pricing and liquidity - the dynamic change in the value of the token, expressed in TRX, depending on purchases and returns; the possibility of full redemption of previously sold tokens.
List.4th: Gamification - additional bonuses for token's buyers, tied at the time of purchase.

2th.Heading: Are you another pyramid?
2th.Text: No, we aren't a pyramid, since we don't use the body of the nested investment to pay referral rewards; for this, the added fee for the purchase and sale of tokens in the smart contract is used. The body of investment in TRX is stored in a smart demand contract by the buyer.

3th.Heading: How does Fotron work?
3th.Text:
The project, which allowed on the platform, fills the volume of its tokens chosen from a smart contract. Besides, it determines the initial price at TRX, the price can't fall below it; and the lockup period during which it cannot take anything from the smart contract.

Investors, coming to the platform, buy tokens of the selected project, listing TRX on a smart contract.

The price of the token is calculated using a complex formula, increases with each purchase and decreases with each sale.

The investor pays a commission for buying and selling, which depends on the amount of the transaction and ranges from 1 to 10%. The larger the transaction volume, the higher the commission.

At any time during the lockup period, the investor can sell the tokens at the current price back to the smart contract and pick up the TRX. An investor can also keep tokens for himself or sell them on any crypto exchange. Also, the investor has the opportunity to buy tokens on a crypto exchange and sell them in a smart contract, but the amount is not more than its original purchase.

At the end of the lockup period, the project receives the remaining tokens and/or TRX from the smart contract.

4th.Heading: How safe is Fotron?
4th.Text: The smart contract is open source and can be validated. None of the projects, including the founders of Fotron, have access to the TRX stored within the smart contract. A report on the code review of a smart contract can be found on our Github.

5th.Heading: How are commissions calculated?
5th.Text:
- commission for purchase = (price of the token after the transaction - the current price of the token) / 2;

- commission for sale = (the current price of the token is the price after the transaction) / 2.

6th.Heading: How are commissions distributed?
6th.Text: The transaction commission is divided as follows:

List.3th: 3) 20% – gets the owner of the referral link, if the purchase was made;
List.4th: 4) 5% of the spread goes to the fast jackpot - QUICK promo (paid every 20 minutes, when a transaction hits the 100th Etherum block);
List.5th: 5) 5% of the spread goes to the big jackpot - BIG promo (paid every three days, when a transaction hits the 9999 Etherum block);
List.6th: 6) 15% goes to the platform operator for the development of the Fotron project.

7th.Heading: How will change the token price?
7th.Text:
The price of the token relative to the TRX varies according to the following formulas:
for buying P1 = T * P0 * exp (TS), where T is the number of tokens purchased, P0 is the current price of the token in TRX, P1 is the price of the token in TRX after the transaction, S is the rate of price increase (eg, 0.05 / 10,000 - price increase of 5% for every 10,000 tokens);
- for sale P1 = T * P0 * exp (-TS).

8th.Heading: What does Fotron give to the user?

Items.1th: In contrast to the purchase of tokens on ICO, the user does not have to wait for the listing to sell them, he always knows the minimum price below which the token won’t fall.

List2.Heading: The opportunity to earn in several ways:

Items.1th: a) it is cheaper to buy a token (to be at the beginning of the purchase period) and to sell more expensively (to be at the beginning of the sales period);
Items.2th: b) get the jackpot when buying tokens;
Items.3th: c) get a 2% bonus on the referral link (for "sociable investors")
Items.4th: d) receive a part of the total bonus for all - 3% of the commissions are divided into all, in proportion to the amount of tokens in the wallet;
Items.5th: e) make money on arbitration when the difference in the cost of a token in Fotron and on the exchange.

9th.Heading: What does Fotron give to the project?

List.1th: A) The ability to popularize your token and increase the number of investors. Hit on the platform means a certain level of project quality.
List.2th: B) Ability to realize additional volume of tokens.
List.3th: C) Ability to earn 3.5% from each sale of their tokens.

9th.Text: At its discretion, the post-ICO project can protect the interests of its early investors by allowing them to buy tokens through Fotron for an amount not exceeding the amount purchased by the early investor at ICO.

10th.Heading: The role of the Fotron team

List.2th: b) Providing regular user and projects support in the telegram chat;
List.3th: c) Providing technical functionality of the platform;
List.4th: d) Provision of a contractual base to users and projects.

FAQ.Heading: FAQ
FAQ.Support: If you didn't find the answer to your question in our FAQ, send us an email

2th.Heading: How to buy tokens through a referral link?
2th.Text: Every time you buy tokens on a smart contract, an account is created that corresponds to the public key number of your wallet, and only the owner of the private key corresponding to this public address has access to this cell.

3th.Heading: I have tokens purchased on the stock exchange, can I participate in the distribution of remuneration?
3th.Text: No, to participate in the sharing of remuneration, you need to buy tokens in a smart contract.

4th.Heading: Can you cancel this smart contract?

5th.Heading: How can we make sure that you don’t withdraw all the money from there?
5th.Text: Read the terms of the smart contract and the results of the audit.

6th.Heading: Can I buy tokens, get your referral link, and immediately sell the purchased tokens?
6th.Text: It is possible, but then you will receive only rewards from attracting new investors through a referral link. The rest of the referral program rewards will not be distributed to you due to the lack of tokens on your wallet.

7th.Heading: If the purchase of tokens occurred without a referral link, where do the percentages go?
7th.Text: In the case of purchase of tokens bypassing the referral link, the reward is added to the general referral fund by all participants of the referral program.

8th.Heading: Does the referral fee automatically go into my Ethereum wallet?
8th.Text: No, all rewards are accumulated in a self-regulating smart contract, in order to withdraw a reward, you must make a request to the smart contract by authorizing in the TronLink wallet on the platform website.

9th.Heading: What should I do if I lose access to my Ethereum wallet for which I bought tokens in a smart contract?
9th.Text: There is nothing you can do.

10th.Heading: What is the minimum number of tokens you need to buy in a smart contract to participate in the referral program?
10th.Text: The minimum amount is set for each token individually and allows you to receive remuneration from purchases using your referral link, as well as part of the remuneration from the general referral fund.

11th.Heading: Can I make my own website with a description of the project and place my referral link there?
11th.Text: Sure you may! We support the popularization of Fotron on the Internet, subject to the accuracy of the information disseminated. On the other hand, we strongly oppose the dissemination of distorted information about the rules and conditions of Fotron.

12th.Heading: Commissions in Fotron
12th.Text: When buying and selling a small commission is paid, as well as the cost of gas, which you can specify on your own during the transaction. With small transactions, gas losses can be quite significant as a percentage. We recommend exposing the gas manually and not making many small transactions.

MainModal.Heading: FOTRON QUICK TOUR
MainModal.Slide1: The platform for the ERC-20 tokens distribution which based on a smart contract with a back sale guarantee.
MainModal.Slide2: TRX reward from every purchase / sale for all token holders.
MainModal.Slide3: The additional remuneration in TRX for attracting users by referral link.
MainModal.Slide4: The possibility of a super bonus obtaining while buying tokens.

404.Heading: Error 404. Page not found
404.SectionTitle: Use the menu to navigate the site

TronLink.Heading: To continue you'll need to have TronLink
TronLink.Text: TronLink is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Tron dApps right in your browser without running a full Tron node. Please, install the TronLink add-on in Chrome, Firefox or Opera browser. Get TronLink

LoginToMM.Text: Please login to your account or approve access to the Tron blockchain

POPOVER.MyBalances: The current value of all your tokens purchased on the Fotron platform in TRX
POPOVER.MyBonus: Your total earned bonus including your share bonus, referral bonus and promotional bonuses received
POPOVER.BigBank: You can get this big promo bonus if your transaction turns out to be the first in each block whose number is a multiple of 9999
POPOVER.QuickBank: You can get this promo bonus if your transaction turns out to be the first in each block whose number is a multiple of 100
POPOVER.PercentBtnBuy: Amount of TRX for the active TronLink wallet for which you want to buy tokens
POPOVER.PercentBtnSell: Amount of tokens for the active TronLink wallet for which you want to sell tokens
POPOVER.TokenFee: Size of the Fotron's commission excluding the cost of gas per transaction
POPOVER.AveragePrice: Calculated average token price of the deal
POPOVER.EstimateBuy: The minimum amount of tokens you will receive as soon as the transaction is confirmed
POPOVER.EstimateSell: The minimum amount of TRX you will receive as soon as the transaction is confirmed
